About Me

Let me tell you a few things......

BIO

I’m an aspiring full-stack developer. I am starting with front-end to build my skillset and increase my knowledge. I've been in the trades for years, pursued an Electrical Apprentiship but now switching into the tech industry. I’m excited and determined to bring my skill-set, hard work ethic, discipline, talents and abilities to provide services and to serve others while in the process of building fantastic looking websites.

Background

Front End Developer

I am a life-long learner who's always interested in expanding my skills. I am looking forward to a career opportunity to work for someone to grow and learn more, add value and also to work with a team.

Goals

Full Stack Developer

I want to excel in creating and delievering incredible web sites as well increase my knowledge, talents and abilities in: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Ruby, Java, jQuery, Node.js, Python, React.js, Angular, PHP.

Seeking Opportunity

Working for a firm

I am eager for an opportunity to work for a web design firm helping and serving clients to create an impressive online presence. Adding value to the company that I am apart of and being a good team player!
